Traits.Name: Tactics Aura
Traits.Description: Staggered, dazed, winded, or stunned enemies in range 3 take +2 damage.

Interrupts.Name: Discipline
Interrupts.Description: When an ally in the tactics aura misses with an attack, the Drillmaster can use this interrupt to cause them to re-roll the attack with +1 boon, taking the second result as the final result.
